about what it is to be alive and grow

conducts Tarn are creating this work

it's a it's just especially wonderful to

nothing the piece opens to the public on

team adds to the basic form to create a
huge wave towering 50 feet in the air
this piece is similar to a piece the
Starnes built in Beacon New York a year
ago it's about a hundred and twenty feet
long the artwork and including an arch
at the end of it once that arch touches
ground we start taking apart from the
back and carrying that bamboo through
and over the arch building a new
structure and it just keeps moving down
back and forth to give this idea of the
constant growth in this piece here we
decided to make the seascape with this
idea of a form that's constantly active
but always the same
visitors will also be able to walk
